results.title: Our Gathering, 2018 Annual Gathering
results.short_description: Our Gathering is Tadawul’s first annual gathering combining strategy reveal and entertainment through various activities that are full of surprises and gifts. The gathering is for Tadawul and Edaa employees at APEX convention center (at Kapsarc) on the 31 March 2018
results.long_description: Our Gathering is Tadawul’s first annual gathering combining strategy reveal and entertainment through various activities that are full of surprises and gifts. The gathering is for Tadawul and Edaa employees at APEX convention center (at Kapsarc) on the 31 March 2018
